title: Do Penguins Have Knees?
description: Katie and the Union answer a voicemail question about the ideal breakfast sandwich. The jury’s out on whether or not Travis’ selfie counts (9:00). Katie’s officially on board with Below Deck (18:14). LeBron and Steph are headed to the Redemption Tournament (33:42). Did the Clippers tank and do you blame them (41:50)? Sue Bird is the realest (49:27). The NFL’s new schedule presents a problem for Fantasy folks (55:15). The NHL Playoffs are the best playoffs and you will show them respect (1:14:50). Lastly: advice for two listeners on a cross-country road trip (1:32:42)
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and The Union chat about sandwiches, NHL playoffs, Redemption Tournament & more
